title: Flee in Terror (2U33)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If a [Gondor] companion wins a skirmish, discard an exhausted Orc. That minion's owner may remove (3) to prevent this.
Lore:	“Aragorn smote to the ground the captain that stood in his path, and the rest fled in terror of his wrath.”
Rarity:	U
